Command.CommandString: delete from WMS_BillMaster where BillID in ({0})

select detail.*,product.ProductName,product.CategoryName,product.Spec,product.Propertity,product.ModelNo,product.PartNo,product.StandardNo from WMS_BillDetail detail left join VCMD_Product product on detail.ProductCode=product.ProductCode where {0} ORDER BY RowID

select task.*,Product.ProductName,product.Spec,product.Propertity,product.ModelNo,product.PartNo,product.StandardNo,state.StateDesc from WCS_TASK Task inner join CMD_Product Product on task.ProductCode=Product.ProductCode inner join Sys_TableState state on task.State=state.State and state.TableName='WCS_task' and state.FieldName='State' where {0} order by taskNo

select ProductCode,(InstockQty-isnull((select SUM(UnStockQty) from View_ProductQty where billid!=@BillID and ProductCode=tmp.ProductCode and Barcode=tmp.Barcode),0)) as StockQty from View_ProductQTy tmp where ProductCode=@ProductCode and {0}

select ProductCode,(InstockQty-isnull((select SUM(UnStockQty) from View_ProductCacheQty where billid!=@BillID and ProductCode=tmp.ProductCode ),0)) as StockQty from View_ProductQTy tmp where ProductCode=@ProductCode and BarCode=@BarCode
update CMD_Cell set IsLock=@Lock from CMD_Cell cell inner join WMS_BillDetail sub on cell.CellCode=sub.NewCellCode where {0}
update CMD_Cell set IsLock=@Lock from CMD_Cell cell inner join WMS_BillDetail sub on cell.CellCode=sub.CellCode where {0}

select AreaCode,AreaName,ShelfCode,ShelfName,CellCode,CellName,CellRow,CellColumn,IsLock, PalletBarcode,BarCode,ProductCode,ProductName,CategoryCode, CategoryName,Unit, BillNo,Quantity,InDate,ModelNo, Spec, Propertity, ValidPeriod,PartNo, StandardNo, ProductNo, ProductEName,WeightSum as Weight from View_CMD_CELL_ALL Product where InDate is not null and {0}

select AreaName, ProductCode,ProductName,CategoryCode, CategoryName,Unit,SUM(Qty) as Qty,ModelNo, Spec, Propertity, ValidPeriod,PartNo, StandardNo, ProductNo, ProductEName,SUM(weight) as weight from ( select AreaName, ProductCode,ProductName,CategoryCode, CategoryName,Unit,COUNT(1) as Qty,ModelNo, Spec, Propertity, ValidPeriod,PartNo, StandardNo, ProductNo, ProductEName,SUM(WeightSum) as weight from View_CMD_CELL_ALL Product where InDate is not null and {0} group by AreaName,ProductCode,ProductName,CategoryCode, CategoryName,Unit,ModelNo, Spec, Propertity, ValidPeriod,PartNo, StandardNo, ProductNo, ProductEName ) tmp group by AreaName,ProductCode,ProductName,CategoryCode, CategoryName,Unit,ModelNo, Spec, Propertity, ValidPeriod,PartNo, StandardNo, ProductNo, ProductEName

SELECT TaskNo,BillID,task.Barcode,task.Quantity, CAST( (case when task.Weight='' then '1' else task.Weight end) as numeric(18,2)) as Weight,TaskDate,FinishDate,BillType.BillTypeName,ProductName, ModelNo, Spec, Propertity, ValidPeriod,PartNo, StandardNo, ProductNo, ProductEName, (case when Task.TaskType in('11','12','14') then TASK.CellCode when Task.TaskType in('13') then Task.ToCellCode end) FromStation,StateDesc,CraneName FROM WCS_TASK Task left join CMD_Crane Crane on Task.CraneNo=crane.CraneNo left join VCMD_Product Product on task.ProductCode=Product.ProductCode left join CMD_BillType BillType on task.BillTypeCode=billtype.BillTypeCode LEFT JOIN Sys_TableState TableState on TableState.TableName='WCS_TASK' and TableState.FieldName='State' and Task.State=TableState.State where Product.IsFixed=0 and {0}
